com.davidsoergel.stats

Interface DoubleArrayContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MutableDistribution

    public interface DoubleArrayContainer
extends MutableDistribution
    A distribution that can be represented as an array of double. Of course, any distribution that can be represented as a set of double parameters can qualify in principle, but here the idea is that the parameters are all equivalent in some sense (i.e., frequencies of samples in each of n classes, etc.). In this case it may (or may not) be sensible to apply various generic DistributionProcessors (i.e., adding pseudocounts) or DistanceMeasures (i.e., Euclidean distance) to these distributions.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Soergel
